18% DISCOUNT DAY 1 TEM TEM -- Best way to buy Temtem

If you're like me, you never want to pay full price for a game. Not even one with as amazing devs like Temtem. Luckily GreenManGaming currently let's you buy the game for 18% off the retail price. Just make sure to use UPCOMING18 at checkout. It really is the best way to purchase the game.
